About us

Luke Briscoe - Founder - Twitter | LinkedIn | Personal site

Luke is a Senior Engineering Manager at Monzo, where he leads the teams who build and operate Monzoâ€™s Infrastructure Platform. Before Monzo, he helped scale technology teams at OVO and has worked with technology teams across the public sector and in private retail.

Luke started aemo after he went through a couple of bad experiences with remortgages - receiving bad service, overpaying on variable rates, and having to submit stacks of paper documents whilst going back and forth to the post office.
